entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023
